summary: Two sisters confront their sexual attitudes and experiences while on a family holiday.
cast: Anaïs Reboux|Roxane Mesquida|Libero De Rienzo|Arsinée Khanjian|Romain Goupil|Laura Betti|Albert Goldberg|Odette Barrière|Ann Matthijsse|Pierre Renverseau|Jean-Marc Boulanger|Frederick Bodin|Michel Guillemin|Josette Cathalan|Claude Sésé|Marc Samuel
title: À ma soeur!
